SEARCH
Package controller.enquiry

Class EnquiryManager

Object
EnquiryManager
public class EnquiryManager extends Object
This class manages users interaction and operations related to enquiries It provides methods for creating, adding, deleting, editing, and viewing enquiries, along with handling the associated user input and file operations
Since:
25/11/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
SCSZ Group 4

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    addEnquiry()
    Adds a new enquiry for the currently logged-in student, prompting them to create an enquiry and adding it to the repository
    static Enquiry
    createEnquiry(Student student)
    Creates an enquiry for the given student, prompting them to choose a camp and input their enquiries.
    static void
    deleteEnquiry(User currentUser)
    Deletes an enquiry for the currently logged-in user, prompting them to choose an enquiry to delete and performing the deletion if possible
    static void
    editEnquiry(User currentUser)
    Edits an enquiry for the currently logged-in user, prompting them to choose an enquiry to edit and performing the edit if possible
    static void
    viewStudentEnquiries(User currentUser)
    Displays the enquiries of the currently logged-in user, showing details such as camp name, content, status, replied content and replier

  • Method Details

    • createEnquiry

      public static Enquiry createEnquiry(Student student)
      Creates an enquiry for the given student, prompting them to choose a camp and input their enquiries. Returns the created enquiry
      Parameters:
      student - - The student creating the enquiry
      Returns:
      - The created enquiry or null if the creation is canceled

    • addEnquiry

      public static void addEnquiry()
      Adds a new enquiry for the currently logged-in student, prompting them to create an enquiry and adding it to the repository

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(User currentUser)
      Deletes an enquiry for the currently logged-in user, prompting them to choose an enquiry to delete and performing the deletion if possible
      Parameters:
      currentUser - - The currently logged-in user

    • editEnquiry

      public static void editEnquiry(User currentUser)
      Edits an enquiry for the currently logged-in user, prompting them to choose an enquiry to edit and performing the edit if possible
      Parameters:
      currentUser - - The currently logged-in user

    • viewStudentEnquiries

      public static void viewStudentEnquiries(User currentUser)
      Displays the enquiries of the currently logged-in user, showing details such as camp name, content, status, replied content and replier
      Parameters:
      currentUser - - The currently logged-in user
